name: Testerep: New Beginnings
description:
Testerep: new beginnings is a game made in 48 days with a group of 12 students.

Can you survive 30 days building the new Testerep? Build a new city, protect your buildings with dikes and fight against the water! 

How to play?

You have to survive 30 days in order for you to win the game. Over time there are waves trying to flood your land. You can stop the waves by building dikes for which you need resources to keep maintaining. When building houses and resource buildings, they have to be connected to the main hall with roads to function. Try to balance out your resources while also protecting your main hall and surviving until the end!

Help i found a bug?

Please notify us :)
